server

Class ClientList

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.ClientList

  • public class ClientList
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows specific operations to be done on each ClientObject
    Author:
    Ian Swift

      Get the sockets to the connection
      void userConnect(java.lang.String username, ClientObject client)
      Adds the new user to the list and tells the other client that the new user is connected
      void userDisconnect(java.lang.String _username)
      Removes the new user from the list and tells the other clients that the user has disconnected
